actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to grant survivors of Reserves who retire for non-regular service and die before becoming entitled to retired pay eligibility for certain survivor benefits.

summary.text: Reserve Survivors' Benefits Act - Title I: Annuities Under Survivor Benefit Plan - Grants annuities to the survivors of individuals who would have been eligible for retired military pay for non-regular service but who died before reaching the age of 60. Establishes formulae for computing such benefits. Title II: Medical and Dental Care - Entitles such survivors to specified medical and dental benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to grant survivors of Reserves who retire for non-regular service and die before becoming entitled to retired pay eligibility for certain survivor benefits.
